subject: Citi Field (NYC)
Baseball
Shea Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Mets are excited to leave behind Shea’s musty tunnels and outmoded facilities and move into their new digs at Citi Field.
snippet: The Mets are excited to leave behind Shea’s musty tunnels and outmoded facilities and move into their new digs at Citi Field.
